mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dictionary ( dictionary_name, parent_id, create_time ) VALUES (#{map.dictionaryname}, #{map.parentid}, #{map.createtime})
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS id, d.dictionary_name AS dictionaryname, d.parent_id AS parentid, d.create_time AS createtime, d.modify_time AS modifytime FROM dictionary d;
SELECT d.id AS id, d.dictionary_name AS dictionaryname, d.parent_id AS parentid, d.create_time AS createtime, d.modify_time AS modifytime FROM dictionary d WHERE d.parent_id=#{id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dictionary WHERE parent_id = #{id} OR id=#{id};
